description: AlphaGenome adapter heads (frozen encoder + Boda-style head), val Pearson R (best epoch). No_shift mode, 50% random RC sampling per sequence. K562 Malinois-style chromosome splits (val = chr 19,21,X).
verification: From status doc table of completed runs (Head, Val Pearson, Epochs, Time). train_oracle_alphagenome_full.py reports val/pearson_r per epoch and saves best_model on improvement; these are best-epoch values from those runs.
notes: boda-flatten completed in same run batch; add val_pearson when logged. Test-set (HashFrag ID/SNV/OOD) evals from eval_boda_k562.py when best_model checkpoints exist.
